Reference

All functions

add_juxtaview()

Generate and add a juxtaview to the current view composition

add_paraview()

Generate and add a paraview to the current view composition

add_views()

Add custom views to the current view composition

clear_cache()

Clear cached objects

collect_results()

Collect and aggregate results

create_initial_view()

Start here: create a basic view composition with an intraview

create_view()

Create a custom view

extract_signature()

Extract signatures from the results

filter_views()

Filter spatial units

plot_contrast_heatmap()

Plot heatmap of local contrast between two views

plot_contrast_results()

Plot heatmap of contrast between two result lists

plot_improvement_stats()

Plot observed performance and improvement per target

plot_interaction_communities()

Plot marker interaction communities

plot_interaction_heatmap()

Plot importance heatmap for a view

plot_view_contributions()

Plot view contributions per target

remove_views()

Remove views from the current view composition

rename_view()

Rename view in a view composition

run_misty()

Train MISTy models

select_markers()

Select a subset of markers in a view

synthetic

Synthetic benchmark data for mistyR
